    1. What are the two types of relationships you can create when you create an Entity?

      One-to-many and Many-to-many

      Many-to-one and Many-to-many

      One-to-many and One-to-one

      One-to-one and Many-to-many


    2. When building model-driven apps, which designer is used to define the navigation of your app?

      App designer

      View designer

      Site map designer

      Dashboard designer


    3. When you want to build a set of records for storing data, what component in the Microsoft Dataverse do you need?

      Form

      View

      Field

      Entity
